data.title: What people are saying about Humally

user.title: Real Social
user.text: This is the first big app I know, based on the premise that the user is the customer and doing so,delivers a meaningful contribution to peopleâ€™s social lives

user.title: Groundbreaking
user.text: An App that makes it easy to meet new people wherever I am. Even in a foreign country where you do not know anyone, it is easy to make new contacts

user.title: Time saving
user.text: You can easily plan all kinds of activities with friends, from eating together to a city trip. Also chat and share a photo or video in the app. How convenient!

user.title: All-in-one
